Try Blogging With Jekyll

05 May 2014

So jekyll is light and simple to use. When blogging I can blog with vim.

Markdown is also supported.

I am going to write some javascript:

var this_is_a_var = 0;

...and a little css

.goodStyle {
  background-color: white;
}

Ruby works as well:

def someMethod
  doNothing
end

welcome to my blog
